root.name: Robot Wars: Arenas of Destruction
root.description: ArenasRobot Wars: Arenas of Destruction features many different locations in which the player can battle:Siberian military baseThe London Based Robot Wars Television StudioNew York SteelworksA dockyard in Hamburg, GermanyA Japanese RooftopSao Paolo scrapyardKilimanjaro VolcanoThe arenas all features hazards such as flippers, fire jets and the house robots.House RobotsIn keeping with the television show, RWAOD featured six different house robots - powerful computer controlled enemies that attacked the player if a CPZ (Corner Patrol Zone) was entered.The house robots are:Dead MetalSergeant BashShuntMatildaSir KillalotRefbot
